content.p:
ยง 1408. Registry for children's non-regulated camps. The department
shall establish and maintain an electronic database containing
information collected pursuant to this section and section three hundred
ninety-eight-f of the general business law for the purposes of providing
education and outreach to children's non-regulated camps. Such database
shall include the location and contact information of the children's
non-regulated camp and how many children attended such camp in the prior
calendar year. For establishment and maintenance of the registry, the
annual fee to register shall be two hundred fifty dollars, except that
no fee shall be charged in the case of a children's non-regulated camp
operated by a person, firm, corporation or association for charitable,
philanthropic or religious purposes.
